itemDescription: British civil servant, and Pali and Buddhist scholar (1858-1938)

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Chalmers, 1st Baron Chalmers,  (18 August 1858 – 17 November 1938) was a British civil servant, and a Pali and Buddhist scholar. In later life, he served as the Master of Peterhouse, Cambridge.
